verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Away in a manger, No crib for a bed, The little Lord Jesus Laid down His sweet head; The stars in the sky... Looked down where He lay, The little Lord Jesus, Asleep on the hay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The cattle are lowing, The poor baby wakes, But little Lord Jesus, No crying He makes; I love Thee, Lord Jesus! Look down from the sky, And stay by my cradle To watch lullaby.
